testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on DiseaseBriefing Report Page for localization

substeps.message: Username: pushpendra.kumarjha@clarivate.com, Password: Cortellis@4321
Logged in with user: 'pushpendra.kumarjha@clarivate.com

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese

substeps.message: Index Search Linked Clicked User clicked on the Index Search Link

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by term "cancer"
I click on DiseaseBriefing dataset in the result page

substeps.message: Report link is clicked.

steps.title: I click on "random" report link from the results table

substeps.message: Disease Briefing Report pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

steps.title: I Verify Ch lang for "DiseaseBriefingReport.main" page

substeps.message: On 'DiseaseBriefingReport.main' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'expandAll' with the key 'expandAll' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? ?? and the Content displayed on UI Expand all are NOT matching

On 'DiseaseBriefingReport.main' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'export.caption' with the key 'export.caption' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Download are NOT matching

steps.title: I Verify the Ch lang for "DiseaseBriefingReport.main" report
